summary: THE TRUCK HAD A KNOCKING SOUND.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE MECHANIC WHO STATED THAT THE FRONT COVER GASKET AND MANIFOLD SIDE GASKET FAILED ALLOWING COOLANT TO LEAK INTO THE CYLINDER.  AT COLD START, THE COOLANT IN THE CYLINDER CAUSED THE PISTON ROD TO BREAK.  HE ALSO STATED THAT THE ENGINE WOULD COST $4000. TO REPLACE.  *NLM  *TT
